datoCmsKey.name: Kit Meyering
datoCmsKey.bio:
Hey there, I'm Kit! I'm a queer actor/filmmaker based in Los Angeles, CA. After feeling consistently frustrated that I never saw characters that looked like me onstage, or never hearing stories being told like mine on tv, I decided to heck it and started my own production company with my sister. 

Now we create projects that feature queer, disabled, POC, and other underrepresented stories told in truthful and triumphant ways.
